short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Dr. Saint Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Ji Insan from the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unfortunately not everyone hates Saint Gurmeet singh but most of the sensible people do hate him, and its justified because that shit-head has is the most annoying thing ever.

This Chrome extension will identify parts of a web page likely to contain MSG aka Gurmeet singh ji and erase them from the Internet.

Share with your friends and eliminate this so called saint.
